devdoc.details: This version generalizes the router address

params._weth: The address of WETH or the wrapped underlying coin

liquidate(address,address,address,uint25.details: Send proceeds to the caller, `msg.sender` will typically be a Strategy

params.amount: The amount of 'from' tokens to swap
params.to: The token we want to swap to

setRegistry(address).details: Requires sender to be Governance of the new Registry to avoid bricking.Ideally should not be used

params.path: The swap path used to get the desired token

devdoc.title: Oh! Finance Liquidator V2

constructor.notice: Initialize the Liquidator with Uniswap and Sushiswap V2 Router Addresses

getSwapInfo(address,address).notice: Get the router and swap path for a token pair

liquidate(address,address,address,uint25.notice: Liquidate an amount of 'from' tokens to 'to' tokens from this address

setRegistry(address).notice: Set the Registry for the contract. Only callable by Governance.

setSwapRoutes(address,address,address,ad.notice: Set liquidation route for a token pair on Uniswap

swapRoutes(address,address,address,uint2.notice: mapping of router to source token to desired token to swap liquidation route

tokenSwapRouter(address,address).notice: mapping of source token to desired token to router used for liquidation

userdoc.notice: Contract to manage standard token liquidations on UniswapV2-like routers
